programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep111
programme.desc: Wavey Jones' Locker - Baby Shark and William must travel to the deep dark depths to retrieve Baby's lost microphone.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep711
programme.desc: Pups Save the Skydivers / Pups Save the Cupcakes - Mayor Goodway and Farmer Al are ready for a day filled with Skydiving fun, but their adventure is quickly derailed. Alex and the Mini Patrol get locked inside the flounder.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S11 Ep1112
programme.desc: Pups Save the Yumi Bee - Humdinger sabotages Yumi's Bee costume sending her buzzing out of control.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep102
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Big Bike Shop / The Crew Builds A Super Tub - Rubble and the pups work to build a big bike shop in time for the Bike Festival. When Motor won't take a bath before their family photo, it's up to Rubble and the pups to find a solution.

programme.title: DORA S03 Ep305
programme.desc: Doras Birthday Surprise / Moonlight Fiesta - Dora and Boots find Dora's lost birthday cake and the family throws her a surprise birthday party! Dora and Boots help La Luna find the Luna Lily so everyone can enjoy the Moonlight Fiesta.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S02 Ep224
programme.desc: The Puppet / Gloop Gloop Ah-Ah - The Barbababies decide to create a show and go all out! Barbotine wants to create the best lemonade.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Mac and Cheese / Potato Stew - Tiny Chef makes rainy day Mac N Cheese but a leaky roof creates chaos in his tree stump kitchen! Tiny Chef cooks pirate potato stew and uses a treasure map to find the special ingredient

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Truckball Team-Up - Blaze discovers an exciting new sport called Truckball. But when Crusher and his team of cronies challenge him, Blaze must scour all of Axle City to put together a Truckball team before the big game.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S01 Ep111
programme.desc: CAKE-tastrophe! - A hungry Crusher accidentally turns the baker trucks baker bots to messy mode! Its up to AJ and Blaze to track down all the rampaging robots.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S11 Ep1103
programme.desc: Pups Plus a Plucky Chicken / Pups Save a Pet Show - Humdinger steals Farmer Al's super-powered seeds. Today is Adventure Bay's "Twin It To win It" pet show, where owners and their pets dress in matching outfits.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S11 Ep1104
programme.desc: Pups Save Helga and the Humsquatch / Pups Save the Missing Bone-Stone - Mayor Humdinger is getting dressed for a special day with his Hummy Mummy. The Museum has a brand-new exhibit: the Emerald Bone-Stone! But when the precious bone goes missing.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep623
programme.desc: Pups Save the Phantom of the Frog Pond - A spooky sound forces frogs from their home. The pups must bring them home and solve the mystery of the frog pond phantom.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S02 Ep209
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Ferris Wheel / The Crew Builds A Farm Animal Yoga Space - Rubble & Crew want to give Grocer Gabriel the best beach day ever. When Farmer Zoe's animals need some relaxation, the pups build a perfect place to practice yoga with Coach Karima.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S02 Ep210
programme.desc: The Crew And Skye Build A Mountain Lodge - Skye visits Rubble & Crew from Adventure Bay when their construction project needs some aerial support. But Speed Meister tries to beat the pups to finish the job.

programme.title: DORA S01 Ep103
programme.desc: The Alebrije Adventure / Let's Get A Paleta - Ale the Alebrije asks Dora for her help as the Alebrije tree is wilting. On a super hot day, everyone wants paleta, but Val's paleta truck is stuck!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S03 Ep304
programme.desc: The Time Capsule / Petstravaganza - After finding Grandpa's old time capsule, Baby and William go overboard making their own. Vola throws a pet adoption party for the quirky critters at the pet fair.

programme.title: Sharkdog S01 Ep114
programme.desc: A Storm in Foggy Springs - A terrible storm spooks Sharkdog and he gets loose, threatening to ruin Mom's TV interview.

programme.title: Sharkdog S01 Ep115
programme.desc: Poots and Vegetables - Max tries to find something that Sharkdog will eat that isn't fish.

programme.title: Sharkdog S01 Ep116
programme.desc: Return of the Nightwalker - Sharkdog and Mia team up in an unlikely pairing to stop Max from sleepwalking right into the ocean!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep609
programme.desc: Night Animals - It's night time at Grandpa and Granny Pig's house, and Peppa and George have stayed up late to help hunt for slugs and snails.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep614
programme.desc: Mirrors - George has fun looking at himself in the mirror. Peppa and George try to find other shiny things to see themselves in.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep615
programme.desc: Pedro is Late - The playgroup is going on a trip to the museum. Everyone, is on the bus ready to go. But where is Pedro Pony?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep616
programme.desc: Garden Games - Peppa and Suzy have nothing to do, and are bored. Daddy Pig finds them an old box of garden games to play with. But not all the games are easy for little George.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep617
programme.desc: Going Boating - Everyone has come to the lake to go boating, Miss Rabbit has all sorts of boats for hire. All the families have a race and Daddy Pig wishes he hadn't picked a boat which has to be peddled.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep618
programme.desc: Mr Bull in a China Shop - While enjoying a tea break, Mr Bull accidentally breaks his delicate teapot. He takes the pieces to Miss Rabbit in the hope that she can mend it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep619
programme.desc: Fruit - It is fruit day at the supermarket, and Miss Rabbit is making fruit smoothies. George gets a special 'dinosaur' juice, to make him big and strong. Roar!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep620
programme.desc: George's Balloon - George is finding it difficult to keep hold of his big balloon. Can anyone stop it from flying off to the moon?

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep106
programme.desc: It's Only a Mystery... / The Battle - Taking after his favourite detective, Barbabravo looks for a case to solve. Inspired by their favourite heroes, the Barbababies make costumes.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep108
programme.desc: The Competition Prize / Marvelous Moustaches - The Barbabies win a touchpad and they want to use it and snaffle it one after another. Barbazoo collects photos of moustached celebrities.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep314
programme.desc: Paddington the Rare Bear and Mr.Brilliant / Paddington and the Accidental Hero - Windsor Gardens has two new heroes - Mr Brilliant and Rare Bear, but will Jonathan and Judy be impressed? Jonathan is hailed a hero after saving a rare gnome.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S07 Ep709
programme.desc: Renewable Energy Racers - Blaze and his friends have renewable energy engines! And when the Gas Guzzler steals everyone's gas, they'll have to use renewable energy to finish the race!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep502
programme.desc: Pups Save Big Paw / Pups Save a Hum-Mover - When an ancient relic goes missing, Tracker and Skye must track down the creature that may have taken it. Mayor Humdinger pretends to break his toe in order to win a race.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep504
programme.desc: Pups Save a High Flying Skye / Pups Go for the Gold - When Corny runs away from Farmer Al's Farm during a blackout, the pups need to light the way to get them home safely! Uncle Otis is hurling down Jake's Mountain in a runaway mine car!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S03 Ep302
programme.desc: Goldie's Fintuition / Raising Remy - When Goldie becomes a psychic, Baby and William set out to make her predictions come true. Baby and William look after a baby reef rabbit and learn how difficult it is to be a parent.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S02 Ep216
programme.desc: Going With The Flow / The Decoder - The Barbababies are bored, the rain is preventing them from playing outside. Barbibul has created a clever decoder capable of translating the cries of animals.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep309
programme.desc: Paddington Vs The Seagulls / Paddington And The Lighthouse - Paddington learns that seagulls love chips and will do anything to get them. The lighthouse light is broken; can Paddington help save the boat at sea?

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S02 Ep204
programme.desc: The Crew Builds Library Treasure Tunnels / The Crew Builds A Super Snack Dispenser - Rubble & Crew's favorite book series has new additions! The pups have a surprise just for Rubble... a snack dispenser!

programme.title: DORA S01 Ep103
programme.desc: The Alebrije Adventure / Let's Get A Paleta - Ale the Alebrije asks Dora for her help as the Alebrije tree is wilting. On a super hot day, everyone wants paleta, but Val's paleta truck is stuck!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S04 Ep410
programme.desc: Robots in Space - When Space Commander Megan is marooned on Pluto, our robot heroes will race through wormholes and blast straight through an asteroid field to bring their new friend back home.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Dino Cake / Dumplings - Olly wants to make a simple cake for her Dinosaur Club. Chef and Olly are making dumplings, but when first-timer Olly seems better at making them.

programme.title: Sharkdog S01 Ep109
programme.desc: My Fair Sharkdog - Max and Dennis compete to decide whose 'dog' is the best.

programme.title: Sharkdog S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Shark Marks the Spot - Royce wants to go on a treasure hunt with Max, but Max is distracted with Sharkdog.

programme.title: Sharkdog S01 Ep111
programme.desc: The Fishers Go Fishing - On a fishing trip Sharkdog meets a Great White Shark and Max fears he'll lose his best friend to his wild instincts.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep212
programme.desc: Picture Imperfect / The Fishy Friends Talent Show - Baby accidentally gets messy on family picture day, and goes to extraordinary lengths to get clean before his parents find out. Penny and Wallace team up to perform in a two-fishy talent show.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep112
programme.desc: Rocky-Bye - Hank struggles to overcome his fears without the help of his pet rock, Rocky.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep713
programme.desc: Pups Save A Lost Gold Miner / Pups Save Uncle Otis From His Cabin - Uncle Otis takes a trip to a lost gold mine. After wandering off course, Ryder and the Pups must save him from the booby-trapped mine. Uncle Otis's installs a Smart Home 3000 in his cabin.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S11 Ep1113
programme.desc: Pups Save the Big Book Delivery - Humdinger's kitties make off with Mayor Goodway's book delivery truck.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep103
programme.desc: The Crew Builds An Ice Cream Shop / The Crew Fixes A Squeak - A windy day derails construction on an ice cream shop. There's a mysterious squeak in City Hall and Mayor Greatway asks Rubble and Charger to find and fix it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep624
programme.desc: The Fish Pond - Daddy Pig takes Peppa and George to see a fish pond he used to visit when he was a little piggy. He is a little surprised to learn that a few things have changed since then.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep606
programme.desc: George's Racing Car - It's a beautiful day, but Peppa, George, Daddy Pig, and Grandpa Pig are sitting inside watching racecar driving on television!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep607
programme.desc: The Little Boat - Daddy Pig is left behind when everyone takes Grampy Rabbit's boat to the riverside picnic spot. Will someone remember him and save him some cake?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep608
programme.desc: The Sandpit - Peppa and her friends are busy building a desert island in a sandpit. They are all very proud of it, with its forest, lake, houses, and shops.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep160
programme.desc: Snow Dreams - Bubu has fixed Froga's barometer and everyone is surprised when it says there will be snow today. Bubu wants to make to make a five-seater sled!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep161
programme.desc: Backwards Ron day - Anna and Froga forgot that today is Ron's Day. There's nothing to eat and Christopher is missing! But, in the rush, everything is going wrong. How will they ever manage to throw a great party for Ron?

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Mac and Cheese / Potato Stew - Tiny Chef makes rainy day Mac N Cheese but a leaky roof creates chaos in his tree stump kitchen! Tiny Chef cooks pirate potato stew and uses a treasure map to find the special ingredient

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Lemonade - Tiny Chef makes pink lemonade and has to convince Ruby that trying new things can be fun!

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep76
programme.desc: Backwards and Forwards - The Teletubbies have fun moving backwards and forwards. The Tubby Custard Ride goes forwards, then backwards, then forwards again!

programme.title: Yakka Dee S1 Ep16
programme.desc: Ball - Dee encourages a friend to say ball and we go on a whirlwind word adventure.

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep35
programme.desc: Postie Plom - In this poptastic adventure, the friends are celebrating Valentine's Day. Plom is delivering everyone's cards, but tries to finish his deliveries in time for a big Valentine's Day game.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep13
programme.desc: Weepy - Messy, a monster, explores science questions that children ask about the world around us. Messy finds a very dusty sock underneath his bed, but why does it make him teary? He goes to OKIDO to find out.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep34
programme.desc: Space - Mackenzie, Jack and Rusty are playing as astronauts on a mission to Mars, but during their journey, Mackenzie keeps going missing and no one knows why, not even Mackenzie.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep33
programme.desc: Granny Mobile - Muffin is playing Grouchy Granny at a garage sale, making Dad push her on an old mobility scooter, but when a real Grouchy Granny wants to buy it, Muffin won't budge.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep6
programme.desc: The Why Badge - Why do my feet hurt?', Tag asks Duggee. While Duggee has a think, he tells them 'why' is a great question, and the Squirrels are quick to follow up.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep5
programme.desc: The Mime Badge - Duggee is encouraging the Squirrels to come outside by gesturing through the window. They don't understand what he's doing and think it's funny. When he comes inside, he explains that he was miming.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Squirrel Babies - Spring has sprung! There are cute baby animals to meet and frolic with.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Ladybird's Gameshow - Spot the odd one out or guess who lives here. A great memory tip from Duggee, an edition of The Agony and Eggstacy, and how to draw Enid - down to her last whisker.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep12
programme.desc: White Cliffs of Dover, England - The Go Jetters race to save the White Cliffs of Dover when Glitch digs for classroom chalk

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Fruit Bat - Not wanting to go to bed, Bluey tries to dream about being a nocturnal fruit bat so she can stay up all night long and soon finds herself flying through the night sky.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Bbq - It's lunchtime on Bluey's deck! But the BBQ needs a salad, so Bingo's relaxing sit-down will have to wait until she finds every colour of capsicum her cousins asked for!

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animal Missions S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Andy and the Painted Dog Pups - Globetrotting Andy, Jen and Scout are on a new mission in their Eco-Explorer: to discover more about incredible animal families and their babies.

programme.title: Dog Squad S2 Ep16
programme.desc: Mission: Pop-Pop Lost - Search and rescue dog Dan and his owner Jamie set off on an urban search, looking for Pop-Pop who has got lost while exploring near his care home.

programme.title: Aneeshwar and Lizzie Go Wild S2 Ep16
programme.desc: Tamarin and Crowned Pigeon - Aneeshwar and Lizzie meet two amazing animals: this time it's the tamarin and crowned pigeon. Their wild connection is that they both have fancy "hairdos".

programme.title: Swashbuckle S8 Ep6
programme.desc: Sandy's Waistcoat of Wonders - Sandy claims he can pull absolutely anything from of his waistcoat of wonders, so Captain Captain and Seaweed put him to the test. But Sandy decides there's only one way to properly convince them!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep10
programme.desc: The Choreography Badge - The Squirrels meet Duggee's old dance crew and learn that he was kicked out because he couldn't stick to the choreography. The Squirrels are surprised because Duggee is such a good dancer!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep9
programme.desc: Betty's First Day - The Squirrels are having fun trying out games but are surprised to find out that Betty didn't always enjoy playing.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep8
programme.desc: The Hat Badge - King Tiger interrupts the Squirrels' quiet time when he turns up to the Clubhouse with a magic hat on instead of his crown.

programme.title: Go Jetters S1 Ep38
programme.desc: Caernarfon Castle, Wales - How will the Go Jetters retrieve Xuli's treasured 'Academy Ace' flying trophy from Caernarfon Castle?

programme.title: Go Jetters S1 Ep37
programme.desc: Mount Rushmore, USA - When the Grimbots add Glitch's face to those of the presidents on Mount Rushmore they cause a major mudslide.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S23 Ep8
programme.desc: Batucada - While working on the Brazilian Railway, Thomas and Gabriela get ready for the Batucada carnival at the docks.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S3 Ep28
programme.desc: Pillow Fill - Scarf Lady helps Sarah & Duck catch the fluffs and puffs to refill their pancaked pillows.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S3 Ep29
programme.desc: Castle Scribbling - Whilst visiting a Castle, Sarah & Duck's drawings lead them to an exciting discovery.

programme.title: Stan Can S1 Ep22
programme.desc: Dinosaur - The children want to make a big dinosaur model so they can learn all about it. They make such a huge dinosaur that they want to take it to the museum to be shown as an exhibit.

programme.title: Stan Can S1 Ep21
programme.desc: Kite - Stanley helps Little Woo and Seamus fly their new kite. It gets stuck up a tree and breaks. Using leaves and sticks, they build a better one, only for that to get stuck.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep27
programme.desc: I Am Monty - Monty doesn't think he is similar to anyone else in his family and wonders whether everyone in a family should be alike.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S2 Ep16
programme.desc: It's Time to Meet a New Baby - JoJo and Gran Gran spend the day with Navid and his new baby, Akeel. JoJo tries to play with Akeel, but he either cries or sleeps! Gran Gran shows JoJo a video of when she was a baby.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep29
programme.desc: Puppets - Bluey and Bingo teach Unicorse good manners so he can ask Mum on a date, but things go awry when Unicorse eats a tick.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep30

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep31
programme.desc: Onesies - When mum's sister Brandy comes over for a visit, she brings the kids onesies as a present, which has an unexpected effect on Bingo.

programme.desc: The Lost Property Badge - The Squirrels lose Tag in the Clubhouse but to find him they're going to have to figure out where the Lost Property room is.

programme.desc: White Cliffs of Dover, England - The Go Jetters race to save the White Cliffs of Dover when Glitch digs for classroom chalk

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep11
programme.desc: The Pet Badge - The Squirrels meet a scruffelump in the woods, and despite Duggee's reservations, take him in. But they soon learn the responsibilities of taking care of a pet.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep12
programme.desc: White Cliffs of Dover, England - The Go Jetters race to save the White Cliffs of Dover when Glitch digs for classroom chalk

programme.title: Roots & Fruits S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Pumpkin - Live from the Roots & Fruits theatre, it's Pumpkin demonstrating incredible strength and attempting to break a Roots & Fruits record.

programme.title: Roots & Fruits S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Banana - Live from the Roots & Fruits Theatre, it's Banana revealing an astonishing secret about herself in the opera piece, I've Got a Secret.

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep35
programme.desc: Undercover Tomato - Tomato paints himself green and goes undercover as a Mini Pea to discover how Evil Pea is firing them at Tato Tower. He makes an unexpected new Mini Pea friend.

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep36
programme.desc: Toy Aisle Trouble - Evil Pea takes all the toys in the supermarket for herself and the Cobs to play with. Supertato climbs a big wall of boxes to try and get the toys back.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep76
programme.desc: Backwards and Forwards - The Teletubbies have fun moving backwards and forwards. The Tubby Custard Ride goes forwards, then backwards, then forwards again!

programme.title: Yakka Dee S1 Ep16
programme.desc: Ball - Dee encourages a friend to say ball and we go on a whirlwind word adventure.

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep35
programme.desc: Postie Plom - In this poptastic adventure, the friends are celebrating Valentine's Day. Plom is delivering everyone's cards, but tries to finish his deliveries in time for a big Valentine's Day game.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep13
programme.desc: Weepy - Messy, a monster, explores science questions that children ask about the world around us. Messy finds a very dusty sock underneath his bed, but why does it make him teary? He goes to OKIDO to find out.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep34
programme.desc: Space - Mackenzie, Jack and Rusty are playing as astronauts on a mission to Mars, but during their journey, Mackenzie keeps going missing and no one knows why, not even Mackenzie.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep33
programme.desc: Granny Mobile - Muffin is playing Grouchy Granny at a garage sale, making Dad push her on an old mobility scooter, but when a real Grouchy Granny wants to buy it, Muffin won't budge.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep6
programme.desc: The Why Badge - Why do my feet hurt?', Tag asks Duggee. While Duggee has a think, he tells them 'why' is a great question, and the Squirrels are quick to follow up.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep5
programme.desc: The Mime Badge - Duggee is encouraging the Squirrels to come outside by gesturing through the window. They don't understand what he's doing and think it's funny. When he comes inside, he explains that he was miming.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Squirrel Babies - Spring has sprung! There are cute baby animals to meet and frolic with.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Ladybird's Gameshow - Spot the odd one out or guess who lives here. A great memory tip from Duggee, an edition of The Agony and Eggstacy, and how to draw Enid - down to her last whisker.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep12
programme.desc: White Cliffs of Dover, England - The Go Jetters race to save the White Cliffs of Dover when Glitch digs for classroom chalk

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Fruit Bat - Not wanting to go to bed, Bluey tries to dream about being a nocturnal fruit bat so she can stay up all night long and soon finds herself flying through the night sky.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Bbq - It's lunchtime on Bluey's deck! But the BBQ needs a salad, so Bingo's relaxing sit-down will have to wait until she finds every colour of capsicum her cousins asked for!

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animal Missions S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Andy and the Painted Dog Pups - Globetrotting Andy, Jen and Scout are on a new mission in their Eco-Explorer: to discover more about incredible animal families and their babies.

programme.title: Dog Squad S2 Ep16
programme.desc: Mission: Pop-Pop Lost - Search and rescue dog Dan and his owner Jamie set off on an urban search, looking for Pop-Pop who has got lost while exploring near his care home.

programme.title: Aneeshwar and Lizzie Go Wild S2 Ep16
programme.desc: Tamarin and Crowned Pigeon - Aneeshwar and Lizzie meet two amazing animals: this time it's the tamarin and crowned pigeon. Their wild connection is that they both have fancy "hairdos".

programme.title: Swashbuckle S8 Ep6
programme.desc: Sandy's Waistcoat of Wonders - Sandy claims he can pull absolutely anything from of his waistcoat of wonders, so Captain Captain and Seaweed put him to the test. But Sandy decides there's only one way to properly convince them!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep10
programme.desc: The Choreography Badge - The Squirrels meet Duggee's old dance crew and learn that he was kicked out because he couldn't stick to the choreography. The Squirrels are surprised because Duggee is such a good dancer!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep9
programme.desc: Betty's First Day - The Squirrels are having fun trying out games but are surprised to find out that Betty didn't always enjoy playing.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep8
programme.desc: The Hat Badge - King Tiger interrupts the Squirrels' quiet time when he turns up to the Clubhouse with a magic hat on instead of his crown.

programme.title: Bual Bisnes
programme.desc: Bual Bisnes merupakan sebuah program bual bicara santai dan berinformasi yang meneroka secara mendalam landskap perniagaan tempatan. Setiap episod memberi fokus kepada pelbagai sektor utama Perusahaan Kecil dan Sederhana (PKS) seperti F&B, automotif, kesihatan serta francais. Program ini menampilkan temu bual eksklusif bersama pakar industri, usahawan berjaya dan pemimpin perniagaan, bagi berkongsi pandangan, kisah kejayaan serta amalan terbaik. Matlamat utama Bual Bisnes adalah untuk mendidik penonton tentang peranan penting sektor perniagaan dalam menjana pertumbuhan ekonomi negara.

programme.desc: Bual Bisnes merupakan sebuah program bual bicara santai dan berinformasi yang meneroka secara mendalam landskap perniagaan tempatan. Setiap episod memberi fokus kepada pelbagai sektor utama Perusahaan Kecil dan Sederhana (PKS) seperti F&B, automotif, kesihatan serta francais. Program ini menampilkan temu bual eksklusif bersama pakar industri, usahawan berjaya dan pemimpin perniagaan, bagi berkongsi pandangan, kisah kejayaan serta amalan terbaik. Matlamat utama Bual Bisnes adalah untuk mendidik penonton tentang peranan penting sektor perniagaan dalam menjana pertumbuhan ekonomi negara.

programme.title: Grand Sumo Highlights
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN presents a sumo highlights program for fans around the globe. Today the show features all top-division bouts from July 27, Day 15 of the Grand Sumo Tournament in Nagoya.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Where We Call Home
programme.desc: We meet French Ludovic Touitou who prepares for a traditional ocean fishing boat race in Okinawa, and Filipino Fjord Santos who plans and directs fireworks displays in Daisen, Akita Prefecture.

programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Easy Japanese
programme.desc: #44 I've heard he's giving another recital. / To tell someone what you heard from someone else, use adjectives or verbs without "masu" or "desu," then add "soo desu."

programme.title: Culture Crossroads
programme.desc: Is there a meal you'll never forget? People with international roots living in Japan take you on a tasty exploration of the dishes that brought timely emotional support in their lives.

programme.title: Hello! NHK World-Japan
programme.desc: August marks 80 years since WW2's end. NHK will run a special feature on Hiroshima & Nagasaki, with programs about war and peace, and a website called "The Pursuit of PEACE: Searching for Answers."

programme.title: Darwin'S Amazing Animals

programme.title: Newsroom Tokyo
programme.desc: NEWSROOM TOKYO dives deeper into the day's news with insight and analysis, from the perspective of Japan and the rest of Asia. We put a spotlight on what you need to know to understand the issues.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: In 2024, Oki Taikan was awarded the prestigious Stockholm Water Prize for his contributions to more sustainable water management on a global scale. He shares his research and proposals for the future.

programme.title: 1/1000: Lay Judges
programme.desc: 1 in 1000 Japanese have experience as a lay judge in court cases. We witness a networking event for former lay judges, where they discuss unique experiences. What does it feel like to judge others?

programme.title: Hit The Road 5Minutes
programme.desc: Let's see Japan by car! We'll be driving through Hiroshima Prefecture, with our goal being the famed Itsukushima Shrine. Along the way, we'll make a few stops off the beaten path that will amaze you!

programme.title: Ukiyoe Edo-Life: The Piercing Gaze
programme.desc: A man strikes a pose in an iconic woodblock print by the artist Sharaku. Who is the mysterious figure... and what is he doing? And why did the artist want to commemorate the moment?

programme.title: UFC Unleashed Ep1806SensationalSubmissions

programme.title: UFC Main Event EpUFC304EdwardsvsMuhammad2
programme.desc: At UFC 304 in Manchester, England, UFC Welterweight champion Leon "Rocky" Edwards defends his title against Belal "Remember the Name" Muhammad in a highly anticipated rematch.

programme.title: LALIGA TOP MOMENTS GERARD PIQUE
programme.desc: LALIGA TOP MOMENTS GERARD PIQUE - A towering presence at the back and a potent attacking force upfront. Complete domination by Barcelona club captain Gerard Pique.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC311MakhachevvsMoicano
programme.desc: Champion Islam Makhachev looks to break the record for the most consecutive UFC Lightweight title defenses as he faces fan favorite Renato Moicano in the main event of UFC 311, while Bantamweight Champion Merab Dvalishvili defends his belt for the first time against undefeated Umar Nurmagomedov in the co-main. Plus much more action on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 3 Ep8
programme.desc: Mencari Ramli adalah program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep7
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: UFC Fight Flashback Ep1101
programme.desc: Gaethje vs Holloway - UFC 300 was not only a milestone event for the worlds leading MMA organization but featured a highly anticipated bout between Justin Gaethje and Max Holloway as they battled for the BMF belt and the title of the baddest fighter on the planet. See their fight like never seen before with enhanced replays and angles, new footage, and exclusive audio.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC311MakhachevvsMoicano
programme.desc: Champion Islam Makhachev looks to break the record for the most consecutive UFC Lightweight title defenses as he faces fan favorite Renato Moicano in the main event of UFC 311, while Bantamweight Champion Merab Dvalishvili defends his belt for the first time against undefeated Umar Nurmagomedov in the co-main. Plus much more action on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: UFC Ultimate Knockouts
programme.desc: Dana White's Contender Series Alum - UFC Ultimate Knockouts delivers jaw-dropping finishes from fighters who earned their spots through Dana Whites Contender Series. See rising stars and future champions like Jack Della Maddalena, Carlos Prates, Sean OMalley, and more.

programme.title: UFC Countdown EpUFC314VolkanovskivsLopes
programme.desc: UFC 314 previews the promotions return to Miami, where former featherweight king Alexander Volkanovski squares off against Diego Lopes for the vacant featherweight crown. Plus, lightweights collide as Michael Chandler takes on Paddy Pimblett

programme.title: LALIGA TOP GOALS ADRIAN LOPEZ
programme.desc: LALIGA TOP GOALS ADRIAN LOPEZ - Remember Adrian? One of LaLigas famed marksmen scored goals aplenty. Here are some of his best, across his time at Atletico Madrid, Villarreal, Deportivo La Coruna and more.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Whittaker vs. de Ridder
programme.desc: Prelims - The UFC Octagon sets down in Abu Dhabis Etihad Arena on July 27, and in the UFC Fight Night main event, former middleweight champion Robert Whittaker aims to kickstart his campaign for another title by stopping the rapid rise of the Netherlands Reinier de Ridder. Owner of big 2024 victories over Paulo Costa and Ikram Aliskerov, Australias Whittaker is in prime form heading into this matchup with de Ridder, who is perfect in three UFC appearances, with finishes of Gerald Meerschaert, Kevin Holland and Bo Nicka

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Whittaker vs. de Ridder

programme.title: UFC 318: Holloway vs Poirier 3
programme.desc: Prelims - It will be a memorable night at Smoothie King Center in New Orleans, Louisiana, on July 20 when Lafayettes Dustin Poirier makes his final walk to the Octagon to face off with Max Holloway for the third time in the UFC 318 main event, with the BMF title on the line. A former interim lightweight champion, Poirier has beaten the best of the best over the course of his storied career, and now he will close it with a showdown against longtime featherweight champion and current BMF king Holloway in a battle for the ages.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC311MakhachevvsMoicano
programme.desc: Champion Islam Makhachev looks to break the record for the most consecutive UFC Lightweight title defenses as he faces fan favorite Renato Moicano in the main event of UFC 311, while Bantamweight Champion Merab Dvalishvili defends his belt for the first time against undefeated Umar Nurmagomedov in the co-main. Plus much more action on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 3 Ep8
programme.desc: Mencari Ramli adalah program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep7
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.
